subject: Volleyball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The United States improved to 3-2 at the Men’s World Cup with a three-set victory yesterday against winless Egypt in Toyama, Japan.Sean Rooney had 18 points and William Priddy added 12 in the Americans’ 25-22, 25-18, 25-19 victory. The top three teams at the tournament will qualify for the Beijing Olympics.
